epic.title: Integration & Interoperability
epic.summary: Comprehensive integration and interoperability framework supporting healthcare standards, third-party integrations, and Health Information Exchange (HIE) participation to enable seamless data exchange and care coordination.
epic.businessOverview: Comprehensive integration and interoperability framework supporting healthcare standards, third-party integrations, and Health Information Exchange (HIE) participation to enable seamless data exchange and care coordination. The system implements industry-standard protocols (HL7, FHIR, DICOM, X12), provides robust API capabilities, and participates in major health information exchanges to ensure healthcare data can flow seamlessly between systems and organizations.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- HL7 message processing engine
- FHIR R4 server and client
- C-CDA document generator
- DICOM image server
- X12 EDI translator
- RESTful API gateway
- Webhook delivery service
- OAuth 2.0 authorization server
- HIE connectivity layer
- API versioning and management
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Month 1:**
- Healthcare standards implementation (HL7, FHIR)

**Month 2:**
- API development and documentation

**Month 3:**
- Third-party integration capabilities

**Month 4:**
- HIE connectivity and participation

**Ongoing:**
- Standard updates and new integration support
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Regional Health Information Network**

- **Challenge:** Fragmented systems, manual data exchange, interoperability gaps
- **Outcome:** 100% HL7/FHIR compliance, connected to 3 HIEs, 50+ third-party integrations

stories.title: HL7 v2.x message support (ADT, ORM, ORU, DFT)
stories.description: Support HL7 v2.x message formats including ADT (Admit/Discharge/Transfer), ORM (Order), ORU (Observation Result), and DFT (Financial Transaction) for integration with hospital information systems and other healthcare applications.

stories.title: FHIR R4 API compliance
stories.description: Provide FHIR R4 API compliance to enable modern healthcare data exchange, support app-based integrations, and meet interoperability requirements for healthcare systems.

stories.title: CCD/CCDA document generation (C-CDA 2.1)
stories.description: Generate CCD (Continuity of Care Document) and CCDA (Consolidated Clinical Document Architecture) documents compliant with C-CDA 2.1 standard for care coordination and patient record portability.

stories.title: DICOM support for imaging integration
stories.description: Support DICOM (Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine) standard for medical imaging integration to enable seamless exchange of radiology and other medical images.

stories.title: X12 EDI transactions (837, 835, 270, 271)
stories.description: Support X12 EDI transactions including 837 (claims), 835 (payment/remittance), 270 (eligibility inquiry), and 271 (eligibility response) for electronic healthcare transactions and billing.

stories.title: RESTful API with OpenAPI/Swagger documentation
stories.description: Provide RESTful API with comprehensive OpenAPI/Swagger documentation to enable easy integration by third-party developers and support API discovery and testing.

stories.title: Webhook support for real-time notifications
stories.description: Enable webhook support for real-time notifications allowing third-party systems to receive immediate updates about events and changes in the healthcare system.

stories.title: OAuth 2.0 for third-party authorization
stories.description: Implement OAuth 2.0 authorization for secure third-party access to APIs, enabling controlled and secure integration with external applications and services.

stories.title: Rate limiting (1000 requests/hour per API key)
stories.description: Implement rate limiting of 1000 requests per hour per API key to prevent abuse, ensure fair resource usage, and maintain system performance.

stories.title: API versioning with backward compatibility
stories.description: Support API versioning with backward compatibility to allow gradual migration of integrations while maintaining support for existing API consumers.

stories.title: Carequality framework participation
stories.description: Participate in Carequality framework to enable nationwide patient data sharing and care coordination across participating healthcare organizations.

stories.title: CommonWell Health Alliance membership
stories.description: Maintain CommonWell Health Alliance membership to support interoperability and enable seamless health information exchange across the CommonWell network.

stories.title: Direct messaging for secure care coordination
stories.description: Enable Direct messaging for secure, HIPAA-compliant communication and care coordination between healthcare providers and organizations.

stories.title: eHealth Exchange connectivity (federal HIE)
stories.description: Connect to eHealth Exchange (federal Health Information Exchange) to enable data sharing with federal agencies, VA, DoD, and other eHealth Exchange participants.
